category.name: Manufacturing
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: MRMGTC3DModelAttributeIDs
preference.preference_description: Defines the IDs of the Generic Tool Catalog (GTC) class attribute that holds the filename of the 3D step model for a catalog component. The default values are -159003 for detailed and -159016 for basic 3D model. The sequence of the IDs in list defines the sequence how the Resource Manager imports a 3D step model. At first the filename from the first specified attribute is used. If that attribute is empty and there is a second attribute specified in this preference, the filename from the second attribute is used.
